nodes.text: Kaffa was a substance which was sold by at least one shop in the city of Myrra on the planet Akiva by the time of the Rebellion on Akiva. During the battle, New Republic Special Forces Sergeant major Jom Barell hid between the old kaffa shop and a rotten-walled tenement briefly while watching the local population rise up against the Galactic Empire.
Kaffa was first mentioned in the novel Aftermath, which was written by Chuck Wendig and released in 2015.
